name: stipula-fullstack-project
description: Full-stack project for Stipula contract generation and analysis with React frontend.

scripts.install:all-node: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:interpreter
scripts.install:all-python: rm -rf ./analyzer/venv && npm run setup:analyzer-venv && npm run install:analyzer
scripts.install:all: npm run install:all-node && npm run install:all-python
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:interpreter" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start: npm run install:all && npm run dev
